name: Titan Racing
description: A legendary team known for their dominance in the early years of the championship.

name: Apex Velocity
description: A team focused on cutting-edge aerodynamics and aggressive race strategies.

name: Thunderstrike GP
description: Known for their risky pit strategies and fearless overtaking.

name: Nova Motorsport
description: A rising team with a reputation for nurturing young talent.

name: Phoenix Dynamics
description: A historic team that has rebounded from multiple near collapses.

name: Eclipse Racing
description: A consistent midfield team with a reputation for strategic brilliance.

name: Hyperion GP
description: Backed by a major tech corporation, they invest heavily in hybrid power units.

name: Solaris Speed
description: One of the oldest teams, known for their endurance and reliability.

name: Quantum Racing
description: A high-risk, high-reward team that either dominates or struggles.

name: Orion Motorsport
description: A fan-favorite team with an underdog spirit and passionate supporters.
